alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 2:22AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Benton, northwestern Madison, northwestern Carroll, Washington, eastern Delaware, southeastern Ottawa, central Adair and central Cherokee Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 221 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles north of Goodman to 2 miles west of Maysville to 6 miles southwest of Locust Grove. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Tahlequah... Siloam Springs... Stilwell... Eureka Springs... Bella Vista... Lowell... Farmington... Pea Ridge... Prairie Grove... Gentry... Elkins... Tontitown... Gravette... West Fork... Lincoln... Cave Springs... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 43 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northeastern Oklahoma.
